mapper.select: SELECT p.posting_no , sq.co_name , p.work_region , p.end_date , p.emp_type , p.posting_title , sq.file_path FROM posting p LEFT JOIN ( SELECT * FROM company_user c JOIN files f ON c.co_user_no = f.domain_id WHERE f.domain_type = 'COMPANY' ) sq ON p.co_user_no = sq.co_user_no ORDER BY posting_no DESC
